solution_line_template: He's inviting {num_people} guests and will need {pounds_per_person} pounds per person so he will need {num_people}*{pounds_per_person} = <<{num_people}*{pounds_per_person}={total_pounds}>>{total_pounds} pounds of ice
Ice is sold in {pounds_per_bag}-pound bags and he needs {total_pounds} pounds so he will need {total_pounds}/{pounds_per_bag} = <<{total_pounds}/{pounds_per_bag}={num_bags}>>{num_bags} bags of ice
Each bag is ${price_per_bag} and he needs {num_bags} bags so they will cost {num_bags}*{price_per_bag} = $<<{num_bags}*{price_per_bag}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
